name: Edge of Space (itch) (42 BYTES)
description:
You’re on the run, a billion credit bounty on your head. You’ll have to keep jumping from wormhole to wormhole, deep into The Edge, if you want to stay one step ahead of your pursuers. Don’t forget to keep an eye on your fuel. Being stranded in space would be a death sentence, one way or the other.

Controls:

  • WASD or arrow keys to move.
  • Mouse to aim.
  • Left mouse or spacebar to fire.
